ygData.subject: Re: newbie- im
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, In one of my last posts, I mentioned that I would doubt a Singapore Guild forming for at least the next 8 months cos... A)You need at least 10
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,
In one of my last posts, I mentioned that I would doubt a Singapore Guild
forming for at least the next 8 months cos...

A)You need at least 10 regular memebers that play frequently.
B)You need to upkeep the guild *IF* I am right ;-)
C)You have to have a reputation...
D)The guild must be organised I guess, not like UO where I go around seeing
people with titles above their head like [1800-Suk-Ass] or [Masta Blasta,FG]

I never meant to sound so negative. Sorry but my type tone always seem so
<grins>.

Wilson
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> Hi,
>
> I'm guild master of The Dark Wardens of UO. We haven't shifted over to EQ
> and most probably won't as many of our members still stay loyal to UO ;)
>
> H/w, some of us are coming over to EQ (ie play both games, not migrate
> totally), maybe as a new guild or using old guild name. So far no
concrete
> plan yet, we are all waiting for our copy of EQ, hehe.
>
> Regards,
> Dark Flame
